scripts.build-client-win: cd client && yarn build && cd .. && move /Y "client\build" "server\public" && if exist "server\public\client" rmdir /s /q "server\public\client" && rename "server\public\build" "client"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn dev"
scripts.devhttps: concurrently --kill-others "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn devhttps"
scripts.install-all: cd server && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install
scripts.upgrade-all: cd client && yarn upgrade-dep && cd ../server && yarn upgrade-dep && cd .. && yarn upgrade-dep
